replies.body:
Also Toxic Players:

- Muh freedom of speech!
- they should just mute me!
- it's just words!
- they're snowflakes!
- this ban came out of nowhere!
You can't insult toxic player because that makes you ban priority - Riot 2k19

> [{quoted}](name=Krayzie,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JiLyYjKI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-21T14:44:26.704+0000)
>
> You can't insult toxic player because that makes you ban priority - Riot 2k19

Hmm; the idea was more along the lines of:

"What'd I do wrong in this chat?"
"You misbehaved here, here, and there."
"How dare you all insult me with these facts! So toxic!"
